meanings.definition: The quality of being fond of or inclined to drink alcohol.
meanings.sent1: His bibulousnesses were evident at the party as he eagerly tried every cocktail.
meanings.sent2: Her bibulousnesses often led her to enjoy a glass of wine with dinner.
meanings.sent3: Despite his bibulousnesses, he always made sure to drink responsibly.
meanings.sent4: The town's bibulousnesses during the festival could be seen in the overflowing bars.
meanings.sent5: The bibulousnesses of the group made for a lively and cheerful evening.

meanings.definition: The state of being absorbent or soaking up liquids.
meanings.sent1: The bibulousnesses of the sponge allowed it to quickly soak up the spilled water.
meanings.sent2: The fabric's bibulousnesses made it perfect for cleaning up spills in the kitchen.
meanings.sent3: The bibulousnesses of the paper towel were put to the test when a glass of juice was spilled.
meanings.sent4: The soil's bibulousnesses were evident after a heavy rain, causing the ground to become saturated.
meanings.sent5: The plant's bibulousnesses were crucial for absorbing water and nutrients from the soil.
